title: I can't open/redownload league of legends
body:
For the past four days, any attempts to open the league client result in a bugsplat. So, I decided to redownload it.
After a day of redownloading, it has finished and told me that the download has failed. I have been running league on this computer since I first joined last year and it has been working perfectly well. 
I am getting a new computer soon though, but in the meantime I would like to be able to play.
What are some fixes?

replies.body: It sounds like something might be blocking your network from reaching the patching servers, or an unstable connection that's not grabbing necessary files.  To help rule out possibilities, go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is able to get through.  Let me know if that works for you!
Thanks for that! I was a little late on reading and got it figured out, but after reading the guide I think it would have helped. Thanks again!
